A7Z.F.summary: AECI Ltd provides mining, water treatment, plant and animal health, food and beverage, infrastructure, and general industrial sector related products and services in Africa, Europe, South East Asia, North America, South America, and Australia. The company's Mining Solutions segment offers mine-to-mineral solution for the mining sector. Its offerings include surfactants for explosives manufacture, commercial explosives, initiating systems, and blasting services. The company's Water & Process segment provides integrated water treatment and process chemicals, and equipment solutions for various applications comprising public and industrial water, desalination, and utilities. Its Plant & Animal Health segment manufactures and supplies a range of crop protection products, plant nutrients, and related services for the agricultural sector. The company's Food & Beverage segment supplies ingredients and commodities to the dairy, beverage, wine, meat, bakery, health, and nutrition industries. This segment also manufactures and distributes a range of juice-based products and drinks, including formulated compounds, fruit concentrate blends, and emulsions. Its Chemicals segment supplies chemical raw materials and related services for use in the manufacturing, infrastructure, and general industrial sectors. The company's Property & Corporate segment is involved in the property leasing and management activities in the office, industrial, and retail sectors. AECI Ltd was founded in 1894 and is based in Sandton, South Africa.

SPA.JO.summary: Spanjaard Limited manufactures and distributes specialized lubricants and allied chemical products worldwide. It operates through Automotive, Industrial, Exports, and Consumer Goods segments. The company produces a range of food aerosol products; trades in anti-friction powders; and sells fuel additives, greases, and car care products. It serves the consumer goods, automotive, industrial, marine and mining, and household markets. Spanjaard Limited was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Sandton, South Africa. Spanjaard Limited is a subsidiary of Spanjaard Group Limited.
